definitions: a person who replies to something, especially one supplying information for a questionnaire or responding to an advertisement

examples.text: the vast majority of responders indicated that the advertisement was believable

definitions: a person who reacts quickly or positively to a stimulus or treatment

examples.text: the change had already occurred in placebo responders at week one

shortDefinitions: person who reacts quickly to stimulus or treatment

definitions: a person trained to respond to and deal with emergencies

examples.text: these factors facilitated quick pathways for disaster responders

shortDefinitions: person trained to respond to and deal with emergencies
